content:
```text
EXISTING STRUCTURES
###Copper plate mine at position(-21.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position (-21.0, -50.0)
- Burner inserter at position (-19.5, -49.5) that puts into burner mining drill
- Transport belt at position (-20.5, -48.5) that connects the mining drill
- Burner inserter at position (-18.5, -48.5) that extracts from the transport belt
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Burner inserter at position (-13.5, -49.5) that extracts from the furnace
- Wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when placing entities when too far from the target position
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place the entity. The maximum distance for placing entities is 10.

NAMESPACE
Important variables:
```
